metadata.Title: CVE-2023-0590 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: A use-after-free flaw was found in qdisc_graft in net/sched/sch_api.c inthe Linux Kernel due to a race problem. This flaw leads to a denial ofservice issue. If patch ebda44da44f6 ("net: sched: fix race condition inqdisc_graft()") not applied yet, then kernel could be affected.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
